title: Javelin +1
content:
Javelin +1 Uncommon 2~7 Damage 1d6 +1 Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The worn leather strap at the end of this javelin loops around the wrist to let it be thrown with devastating force. Javelin Thrown 0.9 40

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

The worn leather strap at the end of this javelin loops around the wrist to let it be thrown with devastating force.

Javelin +1 is one of the Javelins Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. I
